fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Soul Hunter activates the <Life Steal> skill with every 1 basic attack
• The skill takes a percentage of the damage on all enemy units within range and add it to the Soul Hunter’s health.
• If the Soul Hunter hits one enemy unit with his basic attack, then life steal is
   Life Steal Percentage ×
  (Attack - Defense)
• If the Soul Hunter hits multiple enemy units with his basic attack, then life steal from *each* enemy unit is
  1/3 × Life Steal Percentage ×
  (Attack - Defense)
